actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to review as to its suitability for preservation as wilderness certain lands in the Nez Perce National Forest, Idaho.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to review the suitability of the Gospel-Hump Area in the Nez Perce National Forest, Idaho, for preservation as wilderness. Establishes the Advisory Committee on the Management of the Gospel-Hump Area.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to review as to its suitability for preservation as wilderness certain lands in the Nez Perce National Forest, Idaho.
